data.name: 树 Tree
data.detailed_description:
About the game

"Tree" is a narrative interactive game made by Leap Studio based on the Unity engine.
The story of the game is based on the tree-planting tradition of the Tujia nationality in western Hunan: if a family gives birth to a girl, the father will plant cedar trees in the forest; when the daughter grows up to marry, the tree becomes the best dowry Material, hence the name "Eighteen Daughters".
In the game, the player will play the role of this cedar tree growing in the western Hunan region. Through interactions such as absorbing nutrients, shaking the trunk, shaking off the flowers and fruits, blowing hair, rooting and resisting the wind, the player will consolidate the soil and protect the water, resist wind and rain, and build a deep relationship with the little girl of the Tujia nationality. Friendship, so as to protect each other to grow together, and complete ecological protection and self-salvation.


Awards

 2021 Tencent College Game Creative Production Competition Green Track Silver Award
 2021 Tencent College Game Creative Production Competition Best Popularity Award

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Inter Core I3
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: GTX 750
